trace.content: what is the weather in sf
The weather in San Francisco is currently 60 degrees and foggy.
what is the weather in nyc
The weather in New York City is currently 90 degrees and sunny.

assertions.test:
trace = Trace.from_langgraph(invocation_response)

    with trace.as_context():
        find_weather_tool_calls = trace.tool_calls(name="_find_weather")
>       assert_true(len(find_weather_tool_calls) == 2)

        assert_true(
            "San Francisco" in find_weather_tool_calls[0]["function"]["arguments"],
        )

with trace.as_context():
        find_weather_tool_calls = trace.tool_calls(name="_find_weather")
        assert_true(len(find_weather_tool_calls) == 2)

>       assert_true(
            "San Francisco" in find_weather_tool_calls[0]["function"]["arguments"],
        )
        assert_true(
            "New York City" in find_weather_tool_calls[1]["function"]["arguments"],

assert_true(len(find_weather_tool_calls) == 2)

        assert_true(
            "San Francisco" in find_weather_tool_calls[0]["function"]["arguments"],
        )
>       assert_true(
            "New York City" in find_weather_tool_calls[1]["function"]["arguments"],
        )
